l:dependency.name: SSH2 Easy Plugin
l:dependency.l:description: This plugin allows you to ssh2 remote server to execute linux commands , shell , sftp upload, downlaod etc

l:dependency.name: Ganymed SSH2 for Java
l:dependency.l:description: Ganymed SSH2 for Java is a library which implements the SSH-2 protocol in pure Java

l:dependency.name: JSch
l:dependency.l:description: JSch is a pure Java implementation of SSH2
